message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its high quality and unique features, we believe it's worth more than $120. Considering its value, I propose a price of $180 for you to consider. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to make a counteroffer.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. However, given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $150 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While I understand your budget constraints, I must respectfully decline that offer. I believe the true value of our product is higher than $150. Considering the quality and benefits it provides, I would like to propose a price of $165 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and allows us to reach an agreement.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Alice. After careful consideration, I am still working within a strict budget. I would like to propose a price of $155 for the product. I hope this offers a compromise that is acceptable for both of us.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After evaluating the situation, I would like to propose a price of $160 for the product. This reflects a compromise while still acknowledging the value of the product. I hope this aligns better with your budget and we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to find a middle ground. In light of this, I would like to propose a price of $157 for the product. I hope this suggestion will lead to a satisfactory conclusion for both parties.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. In order to reach an agreement, I would like to propose a final price of $158 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects the value of the product while also accommodating your financial considerations. I hope this offer will be acceptable to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've carefully considered your last proposal. In an attempt to reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I would like to suggest a price of $156 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable and brings us closer to closing the deal.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to find a compromise. In light of this, I would like to propose a final price of $157 for the product. This price reflects a reasonable compromise between the value of the product and your budget constraints. I hope this offer will be acceptable and allow us to conclude our negotiations successfully.

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I've taken into account all previous discussions and propose a final price of $155 for the product. I believe this represents a fair compromise and I hope it will lead to a successful conclusion of our negotiations.
